resources.string:
If you are running both the Cadpage and Active911 apps on the same device, you may have found that pages stopped coming to Cadpage after upgrading to the latest version of Active911. You can fix this by unregistering and re-registering Cadpage with the Active911 servers.
 
 New Locations:
 Hayward County, CA
 South Lake Tahoe, CA
 Hendry County, FL
 Monett, MO
 Park County, MT
 Nassau County, NY (alt)
 Sundry County, VA
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Santa Cruz County, CA
 Polk County, IA
 Louisville, KY
 Ingham County, MI
 Livingston County, MI
 Hanover County, NC
 Lake County, OH
 Benton County, OR
 Clearfield County, PA
 Crawford County, PA
 Carroll County, VA
 Loudoun County, VA
